abstractText: The three surviving palm-leaf folios of this Nepalese fragmentary manuscript, probably dated to the 13th or 14th century, belong to the Catuṣpīṭhatantra tradition, containing verses 1.1.10.-1.1.71 of the root text as identified by Péter Szántó.
abstractShort: The three surviving palm-leaf folios of this Nepalese fragmentary manuscript, probably dated to the 13th or 14th century,
title: Catuṣpīṭhatantra
